RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the flatbed trailer: flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevrolet truck

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: Defendant in the case, driver of the 2008 Chevrolet truck, identified himself as a truck driver by trade, has a history of arrests including smuggling of illegal aliens and drugs, served 9 years in federal prison
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Government: Party responding to Federico Saldana's motion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court in the above-styled cause: Court presiding over Federico Saldana's case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Federico: Vehicle driven by Federico Saldana on the day in question, with a license plate registered in San Antonio, outfitted with over-sized tires and after-market rims, involved in unsafe driving maneuvers, stopped by Williamson County Sheriff's Office, suspected to contain smuggled substances, searched by K-9 dog
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevro: Trailer towed by the vehicle driven by Federico Saldana, transporting a scissor lift, with a license plate registered in Laredo, modified to potentially hide loads of narcotics, searched by K-9 dog
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: Veteran narcotics investigator with Williamson County Sheriff's Office, testified about atypical features of the 2008 Chevrolet truck and flatbed trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: Narcotics detective with Williamson County Sheriff's Office, relative newcomer to the narcotics division
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel Martin Huerta: Registered owner of the flatbed trailer, first name mentioned by Federico Saldana as the owner
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel A. Huerta: Registered owner of the 2008 Chevrolet truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Heather Vargas: Williamson County Sheriff's Office detectives involved in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Josiah Bennett's patrol car: Patrol car used to transport K-9 dog used for searching
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Deputy Jason Cox's patrol video: Video recording of the traffic stop, with audio that is not entirely clear
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.cab of the 2008 Chevrolet truck driven b: Area where vehicle registration documents were found, searched by K-9 dog
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.smuggled persons: Individuals smuggled by Federico Saldana in a previous incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.smuggled substances: Drugs transported by Federico Saldana, including suspected presence in the 2008 Chevrolet truck and flatbed trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.cocaine: Specific type of drug asked about during interrogation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.methamphetamine: Specific type of drug asked about during interrogation
